about_the_game:
Project Z is a TopDown view Tower & Defense game, set in a post apocalyptic city from the future. The title is exclusively developed for PC by Parisi Interactive Games. The game system consists of defending a shelter while placing traps to defend yourself from zombie attacks.
We transport you to the year 2025, where a human experiment laboratory tries to develop a substance that would bring the dead back to life. But whose experiment hasn't gone quite right, and now the world isn't what it once knew.
Our character (Leonard) faces alone against waves of zombies whose objective is to attack the shelter, to contain these attacks, Leonard will place traps throughout the levels and use the few weapons that he possesses.
Special features:
  • To get the use of the traps, you must collect lots of money that you will find distributed in the levels or by killing the zombies.
  • The weapons you will use will be provided by non-playable characters
  • Explore the level to get an idea of the key points marked on the map to prepare your defense
  • Play slowly, since the waves are not automatic, you must press the wave call button.
  • Contains moderate violence and gore
detailed_description:
Project Z is a TopDown view Tower & Defense game, set in a post apocalyptic city from the future. The title is exclusively developed for PC by Parisi Interactive Games. The game system consists of defending a shelter while placing traps to defend yourself from zombie attacks.
We transport you to the year 2025, where a human experiment laboratory tries to develop a substance that would bring the dead back to life. But whose experiment hasn't gone quite right, and now the world isn't what it once knew.
Our character (Leonard) faces alone against waves of zombies whose objective is to attack the shelter, to contain these attacks, Leonard will place traps throughout the levels and use the few weapons that he possesses.
Special features:
  • To get the use of the traps, you must collect lots of money that you will find distributed in the levels or by killing the zombies.
  • The weapons you will use will be provided by non-playable characters
  • Explore the level to get an idea of the key points marked on the map to prepare your defense
  • Play slowly, since the waves are not automatic, you must press the wave call button.
  • Contains moderate violence and gore
name: Project Z: The beginning of the end. Chapter I

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: Tower & Defense game, with TopDown view set in a post apocalyptic world of zombies
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
